room_title: Escape room "The Interrogation Room" by Cold War Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: We did Interrogation Room and never having done an escape room had no idea what to expect. We had so much fun and it was such a challenge. The owner was nice and so helpful. As a former Army vet - he knows all about the Cold War although he is young. You will definitely be challenged but have loads of fun. If we return to area, we will return here to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "The Interrogation Room" by Cold War Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: Our group had such a great time in The Interrogation Room! We beat the clock by just under four minutes! I highly recommend this escape room!

room_title: Escape room "The Interrogation Room" by Cold War Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: This escape room was such a unique and fun experience! My group did the Interrogation room which was very challenging and really made you think. The owner was incredibly welcoming and knowledgeable and helped us through some tough parts of the escape! It was my first escape room but it wonâ€™t be my last! Thank you for a fun time!

room_title: Escape room "The Interrogation Room" by Cold War Escape Room in Daytona Beach
review: We had so much fun! Griffin was an amazing host. The interrogation room was awesome! We can't wait to go back!
